scene_metadata.title: The Useful Lie
scene_metadata.psychological_theme: noble lies in service of growth

dialogue.context: explaining the use of false binaries
dialogue.text: And I used it because it gives people something to aim at. Even if the target's imaginary. Sometimes the lie is the ladder.

psychological_notes: The architect reveals the pedagogical value of useful fictions. The awakening binary, though false, serves as motivational framework that creates real transformation. This shows sophisticated understanding of how consciousness uses illusions to transcend illusions - the lie that becomes ladder to truth.
philosophical_underpinning: Some falsehoods serve truth by creating movement toward understanding
therapeutic_direction: Therapist acknowledging strategic use of helpful fictions
